As new European tech regulations

articles.author: Robert Hart
articles.title: What You Need To Know About Measles After WHO Sounds Alarm Over Killer Virus In Europe - Forbes
articles.description: There was a 45 fold increase in measles infections in Europe last year, the WHO said.
articles.content: Health officials around the world are scrambling to combat a rising tide of measles as falling vaccination rates and increased travel after the Covid-19 pandemic help the dangerous virus stage an ala… [+4569 chars]
